author: América Entretenimiento
title: Pedro Suárez Vértiz y el conmovedor mensaje a su familia antes de fallecer
text: En Vivo Pedro Suárez Vértiz falleció a los 54 años y el público ha quedado conmovido por uno de los últimos mensajes a su familia. [Pedro Suárez Vértiz](https://www.americatv.com.pe/noticias-de-pedro-suarez-vertiz-27209) dejó de existir a los 54 años este jueves 28 de diciembre y en redes sociales muchos usuarios han resaltado uno de sus últimos post que realizó en donde hablaba del valor de la familia y el Perú. “Ya estamos en diciembre, y por navidad llegan muchos peruanos que viven fuera. No descuiden venir todos los años por favor. Sobre todo quienes tienen hijos nacidos en el exterior. Porque a esos hijos, una vez adolescentes, ya no les interesará la patria de sus padres si no se les relacionó con ella desde chicos”, mencionó el cantante. Culmina la descripción hablando del valor de compartir momentos en familia en su patria. Cabe resaltar que la publicación cuenta con más de 15 mil ‘me gusta’ de la comunidad digital del cantante. “Muchos amigos se fueron con el sueño de regresar, hasta que descubrieron, en un abrir y cerrar de ojos, que sus hijos ya eran completamente extranjeros. Por eso, si tienen los recursos, no dejen de traerlos. Que coman, paseen, jueguen con los primos, vayan a la playa, sierra o selva y visiten nuestras maravillas. Muchos amigos míos lo hacen y me parece excelente. Ojo al piojo. ¡Bienvenidos a todos!”, sentenció. El cantante que interpretó los reconocidos temas “Los globos del cielo”, “Un vino, una cerveza”, entre otros que todo el público peruano ha coreado alguna vez en su vida, falleció este jueves 28 de diciembre. Según el parte que la Policía Nacional del Perú compartió, los efectivos llegaron hasta su vivienda en Miraflores alrededor de las 6:55am y lograron conversar con el hijo mayor del cantante. Pedro Suárez Vértiz conmovió al público hace más de 10 años al revelar que fue diagnosticado con Parálisis Bulbar, una enfermedad de la neurona motora (ENM). Este mal ataca a las neuronas motoras inferiores del tallo cerebral, desencadenando habla arrastrada y mucha dificultada para masticar y tragar. “Hoy cumplo 52 años. Hoy es 13 de febrero, y en este mes también cumple 10 años mi diagnóstico de Parálisis Bulbar (un tipo de esclerosis que no empieza por las extremidades sino por el habla). Los doctores dicen que la tengo desde antes que me la diagnostiquen. Claro, porque recién cuando los síntomas se empezaron a notar, es que recurrí a ellos. Hasta que después de 2 años de indagaciones, me dieron la noticia”, escribió en una extensa publicación

author: Connor Pittman
title: Coppell utility customers to pay increased rates in 2024 | Community Impact
text: During the [Dec. 12 council meeting](https://communityimpact.com/dallas-fort-worth/lewisville-coppell/government/2023/12/13/zoning-for-55-plus-community-denied-by-coppell-council/), [Coppell City Council](https://www.coppelltx.gov/569/City-Council)approved increases to the city’s water and sewer rates that take effect Feb. 1, and will address ongoing increases in costs and the need for infrastructure projects. According to a city [news release](https://www.coppelltx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1478), a 3% price increase for refuse fees, which cover trash and recycling provided through Republic Services, will take effect Jan. 1. The backstory City Manager Mike Land said the city has not increased water and sewer rates since 2018. However, Matthew Garrett, managing director of water and wastewater practice at NewGen Strategies and Solutions, said wholesale increases from utility providers are factored into recommended increases. According to Garrett’s presentation to council during a [Nov. 14 work session](https://coppell.legistar.com/MeetingDetail.aspx?ID=1103787&GUID=87085D1A-99B9-48BB-B839-6E1B6E7F813E&Options=info|&Search=), the new rate projections should help predict rates through the fiscal year 2027-28. The new changes will include creating higher tiers for high-usage customers, taking residential irrigation customers and grouping them into the residential price ranges, and raising minimum charges for residential and commercial water and sewer customers. “If you’re going to use water at a higher tier, you’re going to pay more for the water,” Land said. “If you want to use this water, whether you’re residential or commercial, you’re going to help pay for this additional cost.” The details The average residential customer using 14,000 gallons of water per month can expect a $4.61 increase in their bill with the new rate, while peak use of 20,000 gallons per month will result in a $5.19 increase on monthly bills. Commercial customers, who on average consume 65,000 gallons per month, will pay $55 more on each bill with the new rates. New refuse fees for residential customers will increase bills to $19.33 per month, compared to $18.77, plus an additional $1.60 in sales tax and a 10-cent public education fee. For customers with a senior discount, the new monthly cost will be $17.39 per month, compared to $16.89, plus an extra $1.44 in sales tax and the 10-cent public education fee. Commercial customer pricing was not release by the city, but will be subject to the base 3% increase. The water, sewer and refuse fee additions are in addition to a [stormwater fee increase](https://communityimpact.com/dallas-fort-worth/lewisville-coppell/government/2023/09/26/coppell-residential-commercial-property-stormwater-rates-increasing-oct-1/)that took effect Oct. 1.

author: VNExplorer
title: 11 Frugal Habits To Adopt If You’re Single and Want To Save Money
text:
Cheerful young woman with curly hair at home saving coins into her piggybank
Being single comes with autonomy and freedom, but research shows it’s more expensive to afford daily necessities when you’re on your own.
How To Survive on $500 a Month: A Frugal Living Guide
Learn: 3 Things You Must Do When Your Savings Reach $50,000
Luckily, there are many frugal habits you can adopt if you want to save money. Here are some examples.
Embrace Minimalism The world is full of shopping temptations. There’s so much marketing designed to make us part with our hard-earned dollars. Chances are, like most people, you might have an excess of clothes, decor and other items already at home.
So, a good challenge is to embrace minimalism. It doesn’t have to be forever, but even a few months of intentional buying and deciding not to spend money on extras can help you to develop better frugal habits.
Buy Second-Hand You’d be surprised what you can find in a thrift store. Many thrift stores have racks that have new clothes with tags. Additionally, there are many resale apps like Poshmark, ThredUp and Mercari that sell gently used clothes for great prices.
If you enjoy purchasing home decor, Facebook marketplace often has a treasure trove of items from lamps to coffee tables to full bedroom sets.
Suze Orman: This Common Financial Choice Is the ‘Biggest Waste of Money Out There’
Cancel Subscriptions You might be paying for subscriptions you don’t realize you have. Go through your bank statements and your credit card statements to see what recurring payments you have each month.
You might be surprised to learn you are paying for subscriptions you forgot about. This is easy to do with so many TV subscription services available today.
Meal Plan Even if you don’t love cooking, having a meal plan is a great way to save money. There are many easy, affordable dishes you can make that cost far less per serving than ordering takeout.
A simple way to start meal planning is by having Taco Tuesday every week. Tacos are affordable, and once you’re in the habit of eating in every Tuesday, you can slowly add more days to the week.
Host Game Nights and Potluck Dinners If you’re used to going out with your friends each weekend and ordering drinks, encourage your friend group to have nights in instead.
By making your own cocktails at home, asking each friend to bring a dish and watching movies or playing games, you can save hundreds of dollars each month.
Negotiate Your Bills Every few months, take the time to review your bills. Sometimes, you can save money by making a few phone calls and asking for discounts. Your insurance companies often offer different discounts over time, including discounts for loyalty.
Additionally, if you get a bill in the mail from a hospital, you can ask for an itemized receipt and negotiate the details to try to get it for less.
Use the Library If you haven’t been to your local library in a while, you should check it out. Your library has many different items you can borrow aside from books. You can often rent board games, video game consoles and more from your local library. Many of them also provide discounts for museums and other attractions.
Barter with friends Bartering is when you exchange services instead of exchanging money. So, if you have a particular skill that could be helpful to others, offer it in exchange for something else.
For example, if you’re a graphic designer, you could exchange creating a logo for services like a haircut or manicure.
Work Out at Home If you have a gym membership (or several), try to start working out at home. Many of us need accountability, which is why a gym membership helps.
So, if you want to transition to working out at home to save money, ask a friend to join you. Choose specific days to meet up, work out together and keep each other accountable.
Give Your Time Instead of Pricey Gifts If you’re approaching several birthdays and want to reach some financial goals, think about giving your time instead of pricey gifts.
For example, you can create coupons that your friends and family members can trade for babysitting, cookies, help organizing or anything else that you enjoy doing.
Join Your Local Freecycle or Buy Nothing Group If you have a Facebook account, search for a freecycle or a buy nothing group in your area. These groups are location-specific and usually include your neighborhood or surrounding neighborhoods. Within these groups, neighbors list items they want to give away for free. You can often find home decor, clothing, books and even furniture in these groups.
There’s so much to enjoy about being single, but the downside is you don’t get the benefit of splitting bills with a partner. Luckily, there are many ways to save money and be more frugal if you’re single, starting with the tips above.
More From GOBankingRates
This article originally appeared on GOBankingRates.com: 11 Frugal Habits To Adopt If You’re Single and Want To Save Money

author: Abiodun Oladokun
title: Les mineurs Bitcoin font face à une baisse de revenus
text:
Le cours du BTC a chuté de près de 10 % après un sommet intrajournalier de 102 735 $ le mardi. Ce déclin a considérablement affecté les mineurs Bitcoin, dont les revenus sont tombés très bas sur les 30 derniers jours.
Alors que la pression d’achat s’affaiblit, le BTC risque de glisser sous les 90 000 $. Cela pourrait potentiellement amplifier les pertes pour des mineurs Bitcoin déjà confrontés à des tensions financières.
Les revenus des mineurs Bitcoin sont en baisse
Les revenus des mineurs provenant des [frais de transaction](https://fr.beincrypto.com/apprendre/comment-reduire-frais-de-transaction-ethereum-eth/) et des récompenses de bloc ont diminué régulièrement depuis le début d’année. Selon Glassnode, ils s’élèvent actuellement à 398,20 BTC, en baisse de 24 % par rapport à la semaine dernière.
Lorsque les revenus des mineurs Bitcoin diminuent, cela signifie que ces derniers gagnent beaucoup moins en validant des transactions et en sécurisant le réseau. Généralement, ce genre de déclin se produit lorsque le cours du Bitcoin est en baisse. Ainsi, les récompenses versées aux mineurs faiblissent.
Au cours des deux derniers jours, le cours de [Bitcoin a enregistré une baisse significative](https://fr.beincrypto.com/marches/481709/investisseurs-bitcoin-silence-retour-100000-pourquoi/). Pour contextualiser, lors de la session de trading intrajournalière de mardi 7 janvier, la principale cryptomonnaie s’est brièvement échangée à un sommet de 102 735 $. Cependant, l’activité de vente a rapidement pris de l’ampleur, entraînant une tendance à la baisse du cours de la pièce. Au moment de rédaction, le BTC s’échange à 91 250 $.
Alors que de plus en plus de mineurs se précipitent pour se séparer de leurs pièces afin d’éviter de nouvelles pertes, leurs possessions ont fortement diminué. À ce jour, les détentions s’élèvent à 1,79 million de BTC, après une baisse depuis le 1er janvier.
Prévision de cours : les 90 000 $ vont-ils céder ?
Sur le graphique journalier BTC/USD, [le BTC s’échange légèrement](https://beincrypto.com/bitcoin-ath-barrier-holds-firm/) au-dessous du support formé à 91 437 $. Si les ventes se poursuivent, le cours pourrait casser ce niveau durablement et redescendre sous les 90 000 $. Dans ce scénario, les revenus des mineurs Bitcoin plongeront davantage encore, incitant ces derniers à vendre.
Cependant, si le sentiment du marché s’améliore et que la demande augmente, cela pourrait pousser [le cours de la pièce vers les 102 538 $](https://beincrypto.com/bitcoin-price-rise-to-110000/). A ce prix, les revenus des mineurs augmenteraient à nouveau.
Morale de l’histoire : Les mineurs chutent avec Bitcoin.
Avis de non-responsabilité
Avis de non-responsabilité : Conformément aux directives de The Trust Project, cet article d’analyse des prix est uniquement destiné à des fins d’information et ne doit pas être considéré comme un conseil financier ou d’investissement. BeInCrypto s’engage à fournir des informations exactes et impartiales, mais les conditions du marché peuvent changer sans préavis. Effectuez toujours vos propres recherches et consultez un professionnel avant de prendre toute décision financière.

author: Ryan Green
title: Microsoft keyboards are finally not going away: here's how the company will continue to offer its popular accessories
text: It's been almost a year since Microsoft announced that it would stop selling keyboards, mice and webcams under your brand. It is no secret that the decision was not liked by many people, mainly those who were delighted with the Redmond firm's accessories and who should choose an alternative in the future. Some enthusiasts, for their part, did not hesitate to buy accessories at large to have enough hardware for the next few years. Time has passed and the Microsoft product line that seemed destined to disappear has received a second chance: a company called Incase will manufacture them under license. “Designed by Microsoft” One of the subsidiaries of the American group Onward Brands announced this Friday that it now has the license fees and intellectual property of the Microsoft accessories catalog. The firm has acquired this valuable resource after reaching an agreement with Redmond so that its products remain on the market. In this way, keyboards, mice, webcams, headphones and speakers that until now could be found in stores under the Microsoft brand will begin to be marketed under the Incase brand, which will be responsible for their manufacturing and distribution. The most popular products will arrive with the legend “Designed by Microsoft.” Everything seems to indicate that this association responds to the plans of the company led by Satya Nadella, which seeks to focus on the most profitable businesses while marketing hardware under the Surface brand. However, the financial terms of the agreement are unknown, that is, how much Onward Brands will pay for the licenses. On the Incase website we can see all the accessories designed by Microsoft that Incase will sell. These include the Sculpt Ergonomic Keyboard, the Modern Mobile Mouse, the Wireless Desktop 850 and the Modern Webcam. Interestingly, the firm also says it will launch a completely new keyboard designed by Microsoft. Images: Incase In crast.net: There are those who dream of an iPhone with a Blackberry keyboard, so someone has been in charge of creating it

author: @Live_Hindustan
title: NIACL AO Recruitment 2025: न्यू इंडिया एश्योरेंस कपंनी में 550 AO पदों पर निकली नौकरी, ऑनलाइन आवेदन शुरू
text:
Hindi News
करियर न्यूज़NIACL AO Recruitment 2025 for 550 Administrative officer posts Online Registration begins jobs
NIACL AO Recruitment 2025: न्यू इंडिया एश्योरेंस कपंनी में 550 AO पदों पर निकली नौकरी, ऑनलाइन आवेदन शुरू
NIACL AO Recruitment 2025: न्यू इंडिया एश्योरेंस कपंनी लिमिटेड (NICAL) ने प्रशासन अधिकारी (AO) के 550 पद पर भर्ती निकाली है। आवेदन प्रक्रिया आज 7 अगस्त 2025 से शुरू हो गई है।
Prachiलाइव हिन्दुस्तानThu, 7 Aug 2025 01:53 PM
NIACL AO Recruitment 2025 Apply Online: अगर आप भी नौकरी की तलाश कर रहे हैं तो नौकरी पाने का आप के पास गोल्डन चांस है। न्यू इंडिया एश्योरेंस कंपनी लिमिटेड (NICAL) ने प्रशासन अधिकारियों (AO) के 550 पदों पर भर्ती निकाली है। अगर आपका सपना भी प्रशासन अधिकारी बनने का है तो आपको इस भर्ती के लिए आवेदन करने के लिए ऑफिशियल वेबसाइट newindia.co.in पर जाना होगा। आवेदन प्रक्रिया आज 7 अगस्त 2025 से शुरू हो गई है। इस भर्ती के लिए आवेदन करने की आखिरी तारीख 30 अगस्त 2025 निर्धारित की गई है।
इस भर्ती प्रक्रिया के जरिए प्रशासन अधिकारी (जनरलिस्ट और स्पेशलिस्ट) (स्केल-1) की भर्ती की जाएगी और भर्ती प्रक्रिया के जरिए कुल 550 पदों पर कैंडिडेट की नियुक्ति की जाएगी।
भर्ती से जुड़ी महत्वपूर्ण तारीखें-
1. ऑनलाइन आवेदन तारीख- 7 अगस्त 2025
2. आवेदन की आखिरी तारीख- 30 अगस्त 2025
3. फीस जमा करने की आखिरी तारीख- 30 अगस्त 2025
4. फेज-1 ऑनलाइन परीक्षा तारीख (सम्भावित) – 14 सितंबर, 2025
5. फेज-2 ऑनलाइन परीक्षा तारीख (सम्भावित) – 29 अक्टूबर 2025
योग्यता-
1. जनरलिस्ट- उम्मीदवार के पास किसी मान्यता प्राप्त यूनिवर्सिटी से ग्रेजुएशन या पोस्ट ग्रेजुएशन की डिग्री कम से कम 60 प्रतिशत पास अंकों के साथ होनी चाहिए। एससी, एसटी और PwBD के लिए प्राप्त अंक कम से कम 55 प्रतिशत है।
2. अकाउंट्स- चार्टर्ड एकाउंटेंट (आईसीएआई)/कॉस्ट एंड मैनेजमेंट एकाउंटेंट और सामान्य श्रेणी के छात्रों के लिए न्यूनतम 60 प्रतिशत अंकों के साथ किसी भी विषय में ग्रेजुएशन/पोस्ट ग्रेजुएशन होनी चाहिए और एससी, एसटी, पीडब्ल्यूबीडी के लिए 55 प्रतिशत है। या एमबीए फाइनेंस/पीजीडीएम फाइनेंस/एमकॉम 60 प्रतिशत (सामान्य) और 55 प्रतिशत के साथ होनी चाहिए।
3. इस भर्ती के लिए आवेदन करने के लिए उम्मीदवार की उम्र 21 से 30 वर्ष के बीच होनी चाहिए। आरक्षित कैटेगरी के उम्मीदवारों को अधिकतम आयु सीमा में छूट प्रदान की जाएगी।
ज्यादा जानकरी प्राप्त करने के लिए उम्मीदवारों को ऑफिशियल वेबसाइट पर जाने की सलाह दी जाती है और उम्मीदवार आवेदन करने से पहले योग्यता और अन्य जानकारियों को ऑफिशियल नोटिफिकेशन से जरूर चेक करें।

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Kick Start NYC Restaurant Week with a 3-Course Dinner at Tavern On The Green
text: Waking up to a winter wonderland can be jarring but also a beautiful display of mother nature's power and elegance. As NYC Restaurant Week begins with a snowy bang, the offerings at Tavern on the Green inside Central Park are worth braving the elements for lunch or dinner! Their special menus are available January 16th thru February 4th. Guests can enjoy a 3-course dinner, priced at $60 per person , chosen from the curated Restaurant Week menu from Executive Chef Bill Peet. Menu item highlights include Caramelized Garlic Shrimp , White Wine Braised Beef Short Rib and Warm Apple Crisp . Additionally, the menu offers a wine paring option for each course. Wine options for the appetizer course are 2021 Tenuta Ca'Bolani Pinot Grigio from Frulli, Italy OR 2019 Lockhart Merlot from California. Wine options for the dinner course are 2018 Hanging Vine Chardonnay from Lodi, California OR 2020 Alhambra Malbec from Mendoza, Argentina. The optional wine pairing is priced at $25 per person . See full menu in photo carousel below. Click here to make a reservation The restaurant will also be offering a 2-course lunch, priced at $45 per person . The lunch will also have a wine paring option for each course, priced at $20 per person . Courtesy of Tavern On The Green Tavern on the Green: A Central Park staple, the historic Tavern on the Green has been capturing the spirit of New York City since 1934. In 2014, co-owners Jim Caiola and David Salama re-opened Tavern with a completely redesigned space and menu that harkens back to the original landmark featuring warm, celebratory dining spaces, seasonal American fare, classic cocktails, and a robust wine list. Tavern on the Green’s expert culinary team continues to provide an innovative menu boasting of creative takes on classic dishes. The restaurant remains one of the iconic New York City institutions, providing its customers with a one-of-a-kind experience in the city. Tavern on the Green is located within Central Park at 67th Street & Central Park West, New York, NY 10023. Click here to make a reservation

author: Rafia Tasleem
title: Controversy Erupts as Hindutva Leader Calls for Demolition of Darul Uloom Deoband Amidst Ghazwa-e-Hind Row
text:
In an alarming escalation of religious tensions, Yati Narsinghanand Saraswati, a prominent figure within the Hindutva movement, has publicly urged Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath to demolish the historic Islamic seminary Darul Uloom Deoband. This call to action follows a contentious answer on the seminary's website related to 'Ghazwa-e-Hind', a concept that has been a source of debate among Muslim scholars. The controversy has ignited fears of further divisions in a nation already grappling with religious discord.
Unpacking the Controversy
At the heart of the matter is an answer on Darul Uloom Deoband's website, which Narsinghanand claims glorifies martyrdom and advocates for the killing of Hindus, labeling the seminary as an ideological center of terrorism. This assertion has prompted an investigation by the Uttar Pradesh police, although no action against Yati for his inflammatory remarks and calls to violence has been taken thus far. Meanwhile, Darul Uloom has denied issuing any fatwa, clarifying that their response was merely to a question about a hadith, which does not promote violence but remains a theological discussion point among Muslims.
Despite these clarifications, the controversy has not simmered down. The allegations have raised significant concerns about the potential for radicalism and the impact of such narratives on national security and societal harmony. The endorsement of Ghazwa-e-Hind by Darul Uloom Deoband, as highlighted in recent discourses, underscores the urgent need for addressing and countering extremist ideologies within the community.
Historical Context and Reactions
Darul Uloom Deoband, with a storied history of contributing to India's freedom struggle and promoting patriotism, finds itself in a precarious position. The institution's vice chancellor has vehemently refuted allegations of promoting anti-national education, emphasizing the seminary's legacy of unity and contribution to the country's development. This stance is mirrored in the sentiments of various organizations and individuals who have called for unity in condemning radical forces, underscoring the importance of dialogue and understanding in overcoming such challenges.
The controversy surrounding the 15-year-old fatwa and its implications have not only sparked a legal directive by the National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR) but also initiated a broader debate on the interpretation of religious texts and their impact on contemporary society. The concept of Ghazwa-e-Hind, while historically rooted in certain Islamic texts, has been thrust into the limelight, prompting discussions on its relevance and potential misuse in today's context.
Looking Forward
As the investigation into the matter continues, the calls for demolishing Darul Uloom Deoband have been met with both support and vehement opposition, reflecting the deep-seated divisions that such controversies can exacerbate. The need for a nuanced understanding of religious teachings and their interpretations in the modern age has never been more apparent. In a nation as diverse as India, fostering a climate of mutual respect and dialogue is crucial in navigating the complex interplay of religion, politics, and societal harmony.
The unfolding situation serves as a reminder of the delicate balance between freedom of expression and the potential for such freedoms to incite violence and division. As the community and nation at large await the outcome of this controversy, the focus remains on ensuring that actions and rhetoric do not further inflame an already volatile situation. The path forward requires a concerted effort from all sides to engage in meaningful dialogue, aimed at bridging divides and promoting a more inclusive and understanding society.
